name: Super Cooper
description:
Enjoy this exhilarating 3D racing game! Steer the Mini Cooper and avoid the elements!

Use the arrow keys or push the
car with your mouse.
Your score is calculated
by the distance traveled,
your top speed, and 
diamonds collected.
Powerups last for about
10 seconds and are:
1. Slow down
2. Turbo (Speeds up)
3. Fog (Affects looking ahead)
4. Rain (Affects steering)
5. Shield (Crash protection)
